title: PESU Internal marks
content:
Why teachers doesn't give full marks in worksheets and case study although we have written Exact same answer as others they get more we get less   
is there any way to approach to teachers regarding this  
even in ISA also they won;t give question from the study material they have created   
WHY PESU

comments.body: From my 4 semesters of experience, I can say that they would rather do grade shifting but they will never sacrifice on difficulty level of ISAs and ESAs. This puts mental stress on students ngl..

yeah the internals thing is annoying and it almost feels like they write a random number as marks. nothing you can do about it though

as for the isa, what do you expect

this isn't like narayana where they'll give a question bank and guarantee that the questions will be the same. learn to understand the concept instead of approaching every subject with the sole goal being answering ISA questions.

in the long run you will benefit. in the short run they will do relative grading and everyone gets good grades anyways. it's a win-win
I know however it's a win I wanted to recover fee from scholarship as much as possible ðŸ™‚

you will dude. just learn the ideas instead of mug up. but there are definitely subjects where mug up is the only way. chem, phy, mech, i remember a lot of epd as well. and math is a bit of both. 

but mainly try to understand c and python
